title: I got into a physical fight with a difficult elder woman & now avoid her, how to rectify this?
transcript: Halima from France Assalamu Alaikum Sheikh Alaikumussalam Wa Rahmatullah Yes sir thank you very much unfortunately for me about two to three years ago I unfortunately got into physical fight with an elder woman so like yes sir so I don't know what can I do in this situation because I have been avoiding her because she seems to be a very difficult woman so I have been avoiding her in order for me to to you know in order to avoid to reproduce the situation because I know Allah will never accept that kind of a behavior in Islam sir is she muslim yes sir then if you meet her in the street you just give her salam but if you don't meet her and you avoid meeting her there is nothing wrong in that inshallah azza wajal you
